features: Quick-zip access reservoir sleeve with included Hydraulics LT 1.5L reservoir
tech_specs.\u2022 Biking-specific features: A low-profile design and airmesh harness provide a comfortable carry while in a riding position, a reservoir offers on-the-go hydration and a blinker light attachment loop promotes safe riding.
tech_specs.\u2022 \nReservoir included: Osprey Hydraulics® LT 1.5L reservoir with quick-zip access and sternum strap magnetic bite valve attachment.
tech_specs.\u2022 \nComfortable & stable carry: Lightweight airmesh-covered backpanel and harness create a comfortable carry and low profile for optimal stability.
